text: Ʋele ɠana ti ʋalani la zooi ɠilazuʋɛ ma, é folo ɠulazu ʋelei Zuludɛn letegi ma, é zo taa wolai Alowɛɛl ma é lɛkpɛma maazu ʋelei ziɛ wolai Aalanɔn letegi ma, Galaade ta Ɓasan yooi ɠɛni ga mináti, ná ɠa Luɓɛn wolodamaiti ta Gade wolodamaiti, naa ʋɛɛ Manasé wolodamaiti ba ti ɠɛni zeini ná.
